translation: I am the sweet fragrance in the earth and the brilliance in the fire, the life in all beings, and I am the austerity of ascetics.
commentary: 7.9 Punyah sweet? Scent: fragrance? in the earth in earth? f and? Teja: brilliance? f and? Asmi am (I)? Vibhavasau in fire? Life is life? in all beings in all beings? Tapas austerity? f and? Asmi am (I)? ascetics in ascetics.Commentary In Me as odor in the earth woven in Me as brilliance is the fire woven in Me as life all beings are woven in Me as austerity all ascetics are woven. I Am The Support (Adhishthanam).
